PluginBase¶

class webgme_bindings.pluginbase.PluginBase(webgme, commit_hash, branch_name=None, active_node='', active_selection=None, nsp='')[source]¶

Bases: object

This is the base-class for webgme-plugins in Python. Use webgme-cli for generating the boiler-plate code for a python-plugin.

META¶

Dictionary from name of meta-node to node dict.

active_node = None¶

The active-node of the current invocation (dict)

active_selection = None¶

The active-selection nodes of the current invocation (list of dict)

add_artifact(name, files)[source]¶

Adds multiple files to the blob storage and bundles them as an artifact of which the hash is added to the plugin-result.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – name of the file bundle.
  • files (dict) – Keys are file names and values the content (as strings).
Returns:

The metadata-hash (the “id”) of the uploaded artifact.
Return type:

str
Raises:

JSError – The result of the execution.
add_file(name, content)[source]¶

Adds a file to the blob storage and adds it to the plugin-result.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – The name the file should be uploaded as.
  • content (str) – The file content.
Returns:

The metadata-hash (the “id”) of the uploaded file.
Return type:

str
Raises:

JSError – The result of the execution.
branch_name = None¶

The current branch (str or None)

commit_hash = None¶

The current commit-hash (str)

core = None¶

An instance of webgme_bindings.Core

create_message(node, message, severity='info')[source]¶

Creates a new message for the user and adds it to the result.

Parameters:
  • node (dict) – The node related to the message.
  • message (str) – The feedback to the user.
  • severity (str) – Severity level of the message: ‘debug’, ‘info’ (default), ‘warning’, ‘error’.
Returns:

Nothing is returned by the function.
Return type:

None
Raises:
  • CoreIllegalArgumentError – If some of the parameters don’t match the input criteria.
  • CoreIllegalOperationError – If the context of the operation is not allowed.
  • CoreInternalError – If some internal error took place inside the core layers.
  • JSError – The result of the execution.
get_artifact(metadata_hash)[source]¶

Retrieves all the files in the artifact from the blob storage.

Parameters:metadata_hash (str) – the “id” of the artifact to retrieve.
Returns:Keys are file names, and values the file content (as strings).
Return type:dict
Raises:JSError – The result of the execution.

Gets the current configuration of the plugin that was set by the user and plugin manager.

Raises:JSError – The result of the execution.

gme_config¶

A nested dictionary with configuration parameters for webgme.

Instance of logger (regular python logger)

main()[source]¶

Main invocation point for a plugin. This must be implemented in the derived classes.

namespace = None¶

The namespace the plugin is running under (str)

project = None¶

An instance of webgme_bindings.Project

root_node = None¶

The root-node of the current invocation (dict)

send_notification(message)[source]¶

Sends a notification back to the invoker of the plugin, can be used to notify about progress. Message can either be a string or a dictionary with keys, ‘message’, ‘progress’, ‘severity’ and ‘toBranch’. If an object is passed ‘message’ must be provided - all other are optional. ‘progress’ - Approximate progress (in %) of the plugin at time of sending. ‘severity’ - Severity level (‘success’, ‘info’, ‘warn’, ‘error’) ‘toBranch’ - If true, and the plugin is running on the server on a branch the notification will be broadcast to all sockets in the branch room.

Parameters:message (str or dict) – Message string or object containing message.
Returns:A dictionary with the plugin config for the current execution.
Return type:dict
Raises:JSError – The result of the execution.
util = None¶

An instance of webgme_bindings.Util
